title: UDL-based blended learning design for nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Integrated online-offline learning environment utilizing personal devices, with a focus on strengthening clinical decision-making based on mathematical thinking.

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to solve medication calculation problems using mathematical concepts by 85% or higher in a blended learning environment designed according to UDL principles.
Learners apply three or more self-directed learning strategies in digital/face-to-face settings to analyze complex clinical scenarios.
Learners complete peer evaluation and feedback processes at least twice using collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace) in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
